world.description: The year is 2342. Humanity has spread to the stars, establishing numerous colonies on distant worlds. One such colony, Tranquility Base, orbits the moon. While primarily a scientific outpost, a strange phenomenon has emerged: the cultivation of a unique variety of banana, known as the 'Lunana,' possesses peculiar magical properties. These properties are harnessed by the colonists for various purposes, from powering their habitats to creating ephemeral art. The lunar dust, imbued with residual cosmic energy and traces of Lunana sap, hums with latent power, waiting to be tapped.

player.name: Orion
player.shortDescription: A curious scientist with a penchant for understanding the inexplicable.
player.appearanceDescription: A lanky individual with a shock of prematurely gray hair that contrasts sharply with their youthful face. They wear a practical, charcoal-grey jumpsuit, stained with faint, iridescent smudges that hint at recent contact with volatile substances.
player.personalityDescription: Orion is endlessly curious and possesses a dry wit, often observing the follies of others with a quiet amusement. They are driven by a desire to understand the 'why' behind everything, especially the strange Lunana phenomenon. Though generally reserved, their passion ignites when discussing scientific principles or arcane theories.

playerLocation.description: Orion stands on the Observation Deck, a circular chamber dominated by a massive viewport offering a breathtaking view of the lunar surface and the distant Earth. The deck is sparsely furnished with a few minimalist benches and control panels. The air is still and quiet, save for the low hum of the station's life support.

rooms.name: Observation Deck
rooms.shortDescription: An observation deck with a stunning view of the lunar surface.
rooms.longDescription: You stand on the Observation Deck of Tranquility Base, a vast chamber constructed primarily of reinforced transparisteel. Below and around you, the stark, breathtaking beauty of the lunar landscape unfolds: the cratered, dusty plains stretching out under a sky black as pitch, studded with impossibly bright stars. Earth hangs like a marbled blue jewel in the distance. The deck is sparsely furnished with a few minimalist seating units and a central console displaying real-time environmental data for the base and the surrounding regolith. Subtle lighting emanates from the floor and ceiling, creating a serene ambiance. The air is cool and has a faint, ozonic scent, mingled with the underlying sweet perfume of Lunana that seems to permeate the entire base.

rooms.name: Agricultural Dome
rooms.shortDescription: A vast dome filled with glowing banana plants.
rooms.longDescription: The Agricultural Dome is a vast, geodesic structure humming with the quiet energy of countless hydroponic bays. Lush green Lunana plants, their leaves shimmering with an inner luminescence, fill the space. Delicate, iridescent fruit hang heavy from their stalks. In the center of the dome, a raised platform holds a workbench littered with specialized pruning tools and small vials filled with glowing Lunana sap. The air is thick with a sweet, slightly metallic scent. Small automated drones zip between the plants, tending to their needs. A faint, rhythmic pulsing can be felt through the floor, emanating from the cultivation tanks below.

rooms.name: Research Lab
rooms.shortDescription: A sterile laboratory humming with advanced technology.
rooms.longDescription: The Research Lab is a sterile, metallic chamber filled with humming machinery and blinking console lights. Banks of computers line the walls, displaying complex energy readings and genetic sequences. A central workstation features a large holographic projector, currently displaying a spinning schematic of a Lunana fruit. Beakers filled with bubbling, luminous liquids sit on lab benches, alongside specialized testing equipment. Glass tubes snake across the ceiling, carrying purified water and nutrients to various containment units. The ambient noise is a low thrum of active processors and cooling fans.

rooms.name: Lunar Dust Repository
rooms.shortDescription: A vast chamber filled with containment silos of lunar dust.
rooms.longDescription: The Lunar Dust Repository is a cavernous space carved deep into the moon's regolith. Towering silos, capped with shimmering energy fields, line the walls, each containing compressed lunar dust. Fine, shimmering particles of moon dust drift in the air, catching the low light and creating a mesmerizing, ethereal glow. Conveyor belts, currently inactive, snake across the floor, leading to loading bays. The walls themselves seem to absorb sound, creating an unnerving quiet broken only by the faint, crackling energy from the containment fields. At the far end of the chamber, a reinforced vault door suggests access to something even more secure.

items.name: Observation Partition
items.shortDescription: A crystal-clear partition offering a panoramic view of space.
items.appearanceDescription: A large, transparent partition made of a clear, durable material, offering an unobstructed view of the lunar surface and the Earth hanging in the black sky. It is positioned in front of the player, angling slightly to their left.

items.name: Central Console
items.shortDescription: A futuristic console displaying critical base and environmental information.
items.appearanceDescription: A sleek, modern console composed of dark, polished metal and integrated glowing blue displays. It features a variety of touch-sensitive panels and holographic projection interfaces. It sits on a raised platform in the center of the room, currently displaying environmental data.

items.name: Minimalist Seating Units
items.shortDescription: Comfortable, modern seating designed for optimal viewing.
items.appearanceDescription: Several low-profile, ergonomically designed chairs made of a matte, grey composite material. They are arranged sparsely around the observation deck, providing comfortable seating with an unimpeded view.

items.name: Lunana Scent Particles
items.shortDescription: Microscopic particles carrying the faint, sweet scent of Lunana.
items.appearanceDescription: A faint, shimmering particle that seems to drift in the air, catching the subtle ambient light. It is barely visible and often mistaken for dust motes, but upon closer inspection, it possesses a subtle luminescence and a sweet, aromatic scent.

items.name: Traces of Lunana Sap
items.shortDescription: Faint, glowing traces of the magical Lunana sap.
items.appearanceDescription: A shimmering, iridescent residue clinging to the edges of the partition and faintly on the console. It glows with a very subtle, internal light and emits a barely perceptible warmth.

itemLocations.description: A small vial containing a shimmering, viscous liquid now rests in Orion's utility belt.

The partition is situated along the outer edge of the Observation Deck, running parallel to the curve of the room. The player is currently leaning their elbows on it, with the Earth visible through it directly ahead.
The console is centrally located on the Observation Deck, positioned between the seating units and opposite the main viewport. The player is standing to its right.
These seating units are scattered throughout the Observation Deck, placed near the observation partition and strategically positioned to maximize the view of the Earth and lunar landscape.

These particles are dispersed throughout the air of the Observation Deck, caught in the gentle currents and often seen dancing near the light sources. They originate from the pervasive Lunana scent permeating the base.

roomConnections.descriptionOfPathFromRoom1ToRoom2: A sturdy, circular airlock door stands between the Observation Deck and the Agricultural Dome. Its control panel flickers with status lights.
roomConnections.descriptionOfPathFromRoom2ToRoom1: A reinforced airlock, currently sealed, separates the Agricultural Dome from the main corridor.

roomConnections.descriptionOfPathFromRoom1ToRoom2: The access to the Research Lab is through a heavy, pressure-sealed door.
roomConnections.descriptionOfPathFromRoom2ToRoom1: A wide, sliding blast door connects this lab to the central hub.

roomConnections.descriptionOfPathFromRoom1ToRoom2: A reinforced blast door provides access to the Lunar Dust Repository.
roomConnections.descriptionOfPathFromRoom2ToRoom1: A reinforced blast door separates the repository from the main corridor, its locking mechanism engaged.

actions.description: Orion looks around the Observation Deck, taking in the details of the room. Their eyes scan the transparent partition they are leaning on, the central console positioned nearby, and the minimalist seating units scattered around. They also notice the faint, shimmering Lunana scent particles dancing in the air and the subtle smudges of Traces of Lunana Sap on the surfaces.

turns.description: Orion takes a moment to survey the Observation Deck. The vastness of space is on full display through the transparent partition, with the Earth hanging like a blue marble in the blackness. The central console hums softly, a beacon of technology amidst the serene, otherworldly view. Minimalist seating units are arranged to offer optimal viewing angles. The air is faintly scented, filled with dancing particles that hint at the unique properties of the Lunana. Faint traces of Lunana sap, almost imperceptible, are visible on the surfaces nearest to Orion.

actions.description: Orion leans closer to the observation partition, carefully examining the faint, iridescent smudges on its surface. The residue seems to shimmer with an inner light, hinting at the unique properties of the Lunana.
Orion gently dabs a finger against one of the smudges of Lunana sap on the partition. The substance feels slightly viscous and strangely warm to the touch. Orion carefully collects a small sample.
actions.newItemLocationDescription: A small vial containing a shimmering, viscous liquid now rests in Orion's utility belt.

turns.description: Orion leans closer to the observation partition, carefully examining the faint, iridescent smudges on its surface. The residue seems to shimmer with an inner light, hinting at the unique properties of the Lunana. Orion gently dabs a finger against one of the smudges of Lunana sap on the partition. The substance feels slightly viscous and strangely warm to the touch. Orion carefully collects a small sample, placing it in a vial that now rests in their utility belt.

actions.description: Orion inspects the Observation Deck, taking in the details of the room. The aft viewport offers a breathtaking view of the Earth, its blue and white swirls a stark contrast to the desolate lunar landscape visible through other sections of the partition. The Central Console hums softly nearby, its myriad of lights suggesting complex operations. Scattered Minimalist Seating Units offer places to rest, though Orion remains standing. The air is faintly perfumed with the sweet, exotic aroma of Lunana Scent Particles, which drift lazily in the artificial light.

turns.description: Orion takes a moment to survey the Observation Deck. The panoramic view of Earth is as captivating as ever, but their scientific curiosity pulls them to examine the immediate surroundings. The transparent Observation Partition, through which the Earth is visible, is the most prominent feature, followed by the enigmatic Central Console. Minimalist Seating Units are dotted around the room, and the distinctive scent of Lunana permeates the air, a constant reminder of the colony's unique cultivation.

actions.description: Orion leans in, examining the minimalist seating units scattered around the observation deck. They appear to be molded from a lightweight, pearlescent material, designed for comfort and to complement the panoramic views. Subtle, iridescent patterns, reminiscent of the Lunana sap, seem to be subtly woven into the fabric of the seating.

turns.description: Orion examines the minimalist seating units. They are crafted from a pearlescent material and exhibit subtle, iridescent patterns similar to the Lunana sap, blending functionality with the unique aesthetic of the base.

turns.prompt: check if there are other rooms nearby

actions.description: Orion surveys the Observation Deck, taking in the breathtaking view of Earth and the details of the room.

turns.description: Orion takes a moment to survey the Observation Deck, the majestic Earth hanging like a blue marble in the blackness outside the viewport. The faint, sweet scent of Lunana particles dances in the air. To Orion's right stands the central console, a hub of potential information. Scattered around the deck are minimalist seating units, inviting a moment of rest. The observation partition Orion is leaning on offers an unobstructed view, its transparency revealing the curvature of the station. The connections to the Agricultural Dome, Research Lab, and Lunar Dust Repository are visible, each marked by robust doors suggesting entry into distinct environments.

actions.newPlayerLocationDescription: Orion stands in the doorway of the Observation Deck, facing the pressure-sealed door that leads to the Research Lab. The faint hum of the station's life support is a constant companion. The door is ajar, revealing a glimpse of the sterile, brightly lit corridor beyond.
actions.description: Orion decides to head to the Research Lab.

turns.description: Orion turns away from the breathtaking view of Earth and heads towards the heavy, pressure-sealed door leading to the Research Lab. With a slight push, the door hisses open, revealing a brightly lit, sterile corridor. Orion steps through, and the door seals shut behind them, leaving the quiet hum of the Observation Deck behind for the focused efficiency of the laboratory.

turns.prompt: go back to the observation deck

actions.newPlayerLocationDescription: Orion stands just inside the Observation Deck, the blast door to the Research Lab now closed behind them. The vast expanse of space, dotted with the Earth's luminous glow, fills the panoramic windows.
actions.description: Orion turns and moves back towards the Observation Deck, stepping through the open blast door.

turns.description: Orion decides to return to the Observation Deck. They turn from the Research Lab and step back through the sliding blast door, entering the Observation Deck. The door seals shut with a soft hiss, leaving Orion once again bathed in the dim light of the space station, with the stunning view of Earth hanging in the void before them.

actions.newPlayerLocationDescription: Orion stands before the pressure-sealed door that connects the Observation Deck to the Research Lab. The door is now slightly ajar, revealing a dimly lit corridor beyond. The hum of machinery is more pronounced here.
actions.description: Orion turns from the panoramic view of space and approaches the heavy, pressure-sealed door leading to the Research Lab. With a practiced hand, they activate the door's control panel, initiating the airlock sequence.

The central area of the lab is dominated by a large, cylindrical containment unit, its interior softly illuminated, hinting at ongoing experiments.
